column2: an A.M. Eatery////I been meaning to try Snooze since I missed my chance at the San Diego location . This restaurant lives up to its reputation
column3: the wait is indicative of that. I got the pancake flight and the sweet potato pancakes with the candied pecans are favorite. The value for money is certainly there
column4: great food with plenty to enjoy on each plate. Definitely a place to make a staple for breakfast or brunch.
